description: This file declares functions for handling 'sheens' requests in a device management system, including parsing device IDs, creating device URIs, and generating timer-related JSON messages.

methods.name: sheens_parse_device_id
methods.description: Parses a device ID string to extract UUID and endpoint values.

methods.name: sheens_get_device_uri
methods.description: Constructs a device URI given a device ID and resource name.

methods.name: sheens_create_write_device_request
methods.description: Creates a JSON request to write to a device resource, optionally suppressing resource URI emission.

methods.name: sheens_create_timer_fired_object
methods.description: Generates a JSON object representing a timer fired event with a specific UUID.

methods.name: sheens_create_timer_emit_object
methods.description: Creates a JSON message to set up a timer that triggers after a specified number of seconds.

methods.name: sheens_create_timer_oneshot_request
methods.description: Creates a complete timer instance JSON message with action script, associated nodes, and start branches.
